mapper.sql: id, owner, name, website, phone, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, contact_summary, next_contact_time, description, address
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_customer (id, owner, name, website, phone, create_by, create_time,contact_summary, next_contact_time, description, address) value(#{id},#{owner},#{name},#{website},#{phone},#{createBy},#{createTime},#{contactSummary},#{nextContactTime},#{description},#{address})
mapper.select:
select customer.id, user1.name as owner, customer.name, customer.website, user2.name as create_by, customer.create_time, user3.name as edit_by, customer.edit_time, customer.contact_summary, customer.next_contact_time, customer.description, customer.address from tbl_customer as customer join tbl_user as user1 on user1.id = customer.owner join tbl_user as user2 on user2.id = customer.create_by left join tbl_user as user3 on user3.id = customer.edit_by
and customer.name like "%"#{name}"%"
and customer.owner like "%"#{owner}"%"
and customer.phone like "%"#{phone}"%"
and customer.website like "%"#{website}"%"
order by customer.create_time desc limit #{beginNo},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from tbl_customer
and name like "%"#{name}"%"
and owner like "%"#{owner}"%"
and phone like "%"#{phone}"%"
and website like "%"#{website}"%"
limit #{beginNo},#{pageSize}
